page.t: Promote cooperation between 2 factions by investing into future ship licencing. The licence giver faction will be able to build vessels for the licence receiver faction.
Assign an Agent to promote a 1-way all-ship production licence exchange.
Licence giver can build ships for the licence receiver.
Licence exchange treaties were signed successfully.
Negotiate peaceful licence removal between 2 factions by compensating for short-term economic losses. The licence giver faction will cease building vessels for the licence receiver faction.
Assign an Agent to negotiate a 1-way all-ship production licence removal.
Licence giver can no longer build ships for the licence receiver.
Licence exchange treaties were nullified with peaceful agreements.
